amendment.description: To ensure funding for victims of Hurricane Sandy is not spent on tax cheats, deceased individuals, or fisheries outside of the affected area.

action.text: Amendment SA 3370 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3395.
Amendment SA 3370 was divided into Divisions I and II by Unanimous Consent.
Amendment SA 3370 Division I as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 3370 Division II, under the order of 12/27/12, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, the amendment was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 35 - 60. Record Vote Number: 240.
